content:
I'd be happy to help you discover some new coffee shops near your office.

To give you the best recommendations, could you please provide me with some more information?

1. What's the location of your office? (City, state, or neighborhood)
2. What's your preferred atmosphere for a coffee shop? (e.g. quiet and cozy, bustling and energetic, outdoor seating, etc.)
3. Are you open to trying different types of coffee or do you have a specific type in mind (e.g. espresso, pour-over, cold brew)?
4. Are there any specific amenities you're looking for in a coffee shop (e.g. free Wi-Fi, comfortable seating, food options)?
5. How far are you willing to walk or drive to get to a new coffee shop?
6. Are there any particular days or times you usually meet with friends for coffee?

Once I have this information, I can provide you with some personalized coffee shop recommendations near your office!
